docker.name: RUN
docker.raw: RUN apk add --no-cache ca-certificates libstdc++ su-exec

docker.name: RUN
docker.args: set -eux;  addgroup -g 9987 ts3server;  adduser -u 9987 -Hh /var/ts3server -G ts3server -s /sbin/nologin -D ts3server;  install -d -o ts3server -g ts3server -m 775 /var/ts3server /var/run/ts3server /opt/ts3server
docker.raw: RUN set -eux;  addgroup -g 9987 ts3server;  adduser -u 9987 -Hh /var/ts3server -G ts3server -s /sbin/nologin -D ts3server;  install -d -o ts3server -g ts3server -m 775 /var/ts3server /var/run/ts3server /opt/ts3server

docker.name: RUN
docker.args: set -eux;  apk add --no-cache --virtual .fetch-deps tar;  wget "${TEAMSPEAK_URL}" -O server.tar.bz2;  echo "${TEAMSPEAK_CHECKSUM} *server.tar.bz2" | sha256sum -c -;  mkdir -p /opt/ts3server;  tar -xf server.tar.bz2 --strip-components=1 -C /opt/ts3server;  rm server.tar.bz2;  apk del .fetch-deps;  mv /opt/ts3server/*.so /opt/ts3server/redist/* /usr/local/lib;  ldconfig /usr/local/lib
docker.raw: RUN set -eux;  apk add --no-cache --virtual .fetch-deps tar;  wget "${TEAMSPEAK_URL}" -O server.tar.bz2;  echo "${TEAMSPEAK_CHECKSUM} *server.tar.bz2" | sha256sum -c -;  mkdir -p /opt/ts3server;  tar -xf server.tar.bz2 --strip-components=1 -C /opt/ts3server;  rm server.tar.bz2;  apk del .fetch-deps;  mv /opt/ts3server/*.so /opt/ts3server/redist/* /usr/local/lib;  ldconfig /usr/local/lib
